mapper.update: CREATE TABLE `${tableName}`( "ID" varchar(36) NOT NULL, "product_id" varchar(36) NOT NULL COMMENT '产品ID', "URL" varchar(256) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '请求URL', "NAME" varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '姓名', "CERT_NUMBER" varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '身份证号码', "REQUEST_PARAM" mediumtext COMMENT '请求参数', "RESPONSE_RAW" mediumtext COMMENT '返回值', "ORIGINAL_RESPONSE_RAW" mediumtext COMMENT '原始输出字符串', "STATUS" varchar(5) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '状态', "CREATE_DATETIME" timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT '2000-01-01 00:00:00' COMMENT '创建时间', "CREATE_OPERATOR_ID" varchar(36) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '创建人', "LAST_UPDATE_DATETIME" timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT '2000-01-01 00:00:00' COMMENT '最后修改时间', "LAST_UPDATE_OPERATOR_ID" varchar(36) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '最后修改人', "EXT_INFO" text COMMENT '扩展信息(JSON)', PRIMARY KEY ("ID") ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
